Anson Poon

CS Student @ Oregon State | Architecture Graduate @ UCLA | Teaching Assistant

Hello!ðŸ‘‹ My name is Anson, I am a CS student at OSU. I am passionate about solving real-world engineering challenges that yield lasting impact. Throughout the last few years, I have been proactively adding value through academia, club activities, and personal projects, I am determined to put myself out there and learn from the people around me. I believe in software engineering and technology being a driving force for meaningful impact, and I anticipate the opportunity to work with you all in this endeavor!
